actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of consecutive terms that Representatives and Senators may serve.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Proposes that the number of consecutive terms that Representatives serve be limited to four terms of two years each, and Senators to two terms of six years each.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of consecutive terms that Representatives and Senators may serve.
